domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

text:
If everyone is ok with giving deadly viruses Africanized names based on ALLEGED origins, like:
Ebola
Zika Virus
Nigeria Lassa Virus
West Nile Virus
etc.
and everyone is fine with the racial stigma attached to this,
then what’s wrong with calling the Coronavirus the Chinese Virus?
